text: "Mr. Crowley" is a 1981 song by English heavy metal singer Ozzy Osbourne. It was taken from his debut studio album Blizzard of Ozz. A live version was released as a single in the United Kingdom. The studio version was also released as a single in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Heavy metal Category:Ozzy Osbourne songs
title: Mr. Crowley
